inclusion.criterion: Underlying portal hypertension due to chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HCV Cirrhosis (tx with interferon x2 with no response)

inclusion.criterion: Ability to consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients already on NSBBs who have stopped treatment for two weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Absolute contraindications for MRI (including participants with metal in/around the eyes)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Absolute contraindications for NSBBs (allergy, presence of asthma)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis and grade II esophageal varices. Recent admission for UGIB due to NSAID gastritis.
